_sText:
Bessenyei Gyorgy Gimnazium es Kollegium
-Kisvarda, Hungary- 

(For the 100TH anniversary of this school)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a part of the real Bessenyei grammar school in Counter-Strike:Source's engine.
This school is located in a small town in Hungary, called Kisvarda.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-=Objectives=-
-Counter-Terrorist:
	"Rescue all the six hostages or kill the terrorist threat."

-Terrorist
	"Prevent the Counter-Terrorist from rescuing the hostages."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: "There are two hostage rescue points, and 40 spawnpoints."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-=Credits:=-
---
Map By: .:|G.o.d.W.a.n.A.|:.
---
Textures:
-Csernay Attila
-Csurka Gergo
-TopHATTwaffle (Real World Textures 2)
Music:
Primary Bitch Zone - Good times

------------------------------------
install:
extract to cstrike/maps folder
